description: This Trap is generated when an unexpected (errant) BPDU
has been received on a port.

event.Summary: $v3 errant BPDU detected by $v8 on port $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstErrantBpduReceived ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex i 0 ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortName s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortVlanErrantBpduRxCount i 9999 ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortVlanState i 1 ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortVlanDesigBridge s EXAMPL ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstDesignatedPort s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstErrantBpduSrcMac s EXAMPL ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstErrantBpduDetector i 1

description: VLAN ID
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex

description: Port name
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortName

description: The number of BPDUs received on a
BPDU-filtering
or BPDU-protected enabled port.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortVlanErrantBpduRxCount

description: The port's current state.
This state controls what action a port
takes on reception of a frame.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortVlanState

description: The Bridge Identifier of the bridge that
this port considers to be the Designated
Bridge for this port's segment.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortVlanDesigBridge

description: Designated Port of the Bridge.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstDesignatedPort

description: The source MAC address of the port sending
Errant BPDU.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstErrantBpduSrcMac

description: The identifier of the feature generating
Errant BPDU trap.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstErrantBpduDetector

description: Trap generated when sending agent has become
the new root of spanning Tree for the specified VLAN;
the notification is sent by a bridge soon after its election
as the new root.

event.Summary: VLAN $v1 selected new agent for bridge $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstNewRoot ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex i 0 ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstNewRootBridgeID s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPreviousRootBridgeID s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstRootBridgeChangeTimeStamp s EXAMPLEE

description: VLAN ID
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex

description: Bridge ID of the new Root. Bridge Id
consists of priority and MAC address.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstNewRootBridgeID

description: Bridge ID of the previous Root. Bridge Id
consists of priority and MAC address.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPreviousRootBridgeID

description: Time when the root changed
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstRootBridgeChangeTimeStamp

description: Trap generated when a Root Guard feature enabled port
receives superior BPDUs on its interface for a
given instance.

event.Summary: Root Guard on port $v2 received superior BPDUs on VLAN $v1

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstRootGuardInconsistency ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex i 0 ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortName s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstSuperiorBpduSrcMac s EXAMPL ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstSuperiorBpduSrcPort s EXAMPLE

description: VLAN ID
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex

description: Port name
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortName

description: The MacAddress of the port sending superior BPDU
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstSuperiorBpduSrcMac

description: The name of the port sending superior BPDU
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstSuperiorBpduSrcPort

description: Trap generated when a Loop Guard feature enabled port
receives superior BPDUs on its interface for a
given instance.

event.Summary: Loop Guard on port $v2 received superior BPDUs on VLAN $v1

description: VLAN ID
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex

description: Port name
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortName

description: The Bridge Identifier of the bridge that
this port considers to be the Designated
Bridge for this port's segment.
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortVlanDesigBridge

description: Trap is generated when a Topology Change is detected in
the specified VLAN.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstTopologyChange ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex i 0 ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortName s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstOldPortRole s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstNewPortRole s EXAMPLE ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstTopoChangeTime s EXAMPLEE

description: VLAN ID
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstVlanIndex

description: Port name
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstPortName

description: Old Port state
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstOldPortRole

description: new port state
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstNewPortRole

description: Topology change time
variables.name: ARUBAWIRED-RPVST-MIB::arubaWiredRpvstTopoChangeTime
